XenotypeDef.label: student
XenotypeDef.description: Some orassans are very passionate about learning, so they get gene mods to make it so they can learn more, faster.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Some students and researchers take genetic enhancements to improve their studies.

XenotypeDef.label: psion
XenotypeDef.description: Psionics are a cutting edge field in orassan science. Incoporating new findings in the field of psionics into the more established field of genetics has unlocked even more potential in orassan psions.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Orassan psionics often employ genetic engineering to enhance their psychic abilities. This comes at the cost of a dependency on synchronisity.

XenotypeDef.label: paramedic
XenotypeDef.description: Lifesaving is a valued profession in the orassan empire. You need to be sociable, cool under pressure, and be able to put out fire with an internal reserve of firefoam. Well, maybe not that part, but genetic modifications allow these paramedics to do so, along with using hemogen to heal wounds. However, they can't feed on people to regain their hemogen stockpiles, so must rely on the generousity of blood donors.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Some emergency services have opted to get special gene mods that help them heal their allies and fulfill their oath.

XenotypeDef.label: super soldier
XenotypeDef.description: While most soldiers won't dedicate their entire lives to ending others, some want to be the very best... or just have the best odds of coming home from the front line.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Some soldiers get gene mods to enhance their combat capabilities. This is often at the expense of their other skills.

XenotypeDef.label: diplomat
XenotypeDef.description: Orassan diplomacy has a storied history of various tactics to appeal to others. This is just the most recent in a line of strategies to get others to, if not cooperate, at least leave you alone. It's an exhausting job.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Some diplomats use gene mods to make themselves more appealing.

XenotypeDef.label: engineer
XenotypeDef.description: Engineers often get special gene mods to make working with delicate machinery easier. These include slender fingers and making their tail prehensile.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Some engineers use gene mods to make working on delicate machinery easier.
